overview:
Kyle Lanning is the Art Director/SEO Marketer for TKT Consulting, LLC of Cumming, GA.

Kyle manages the look & feel, content, and search engine optimization of TKT’s client websites.

TKT has been in business since 2001 and has been providing web based services and software solutions for multi-national companies as well as small businesses.

TKT also specializes in Agency Management Software solutions for the financial services industry. Systems designed, built, and maintained by TKT have paid billions of dollars in commissions and managed nearly one million associates from organizations big and small
